about.title: Hotel Avangarda
about.description: Hotel Avangarda is located in the heart of the charming town of Różan, providing a perfect combination of tranquility and easy access to local attractions. It's a place where tradition meets modernity, creating ideal conditions for relaxation and exploring the surroundings.

directions.car: Easy access from national road 61. Free parking available on site.
directions.public: Regular bus connections from Warsaw and Ostrołęka. The bus stop is located 200m from the hotel.

offers.title: Packages
offers.description: Our packages are the perfect way to spend time in an exceptional atmosphere. Choose an offer tailored to your needs and enjoy unforgettable moments at Hotel Avangarda.
